header.title: About Me
body: What starts out as triumph soon becomes manipulated into a hegemony of defeat, leaving only a sense of unreality and the prospect of a new order.

header.title: What is this?
body: Also, it's an attempt to write some massively over-engineered resume viewer as an effort to learn React.
@todo: Port this across to use redux and make it a universal node/javascript app.

items.body: Developing end-to-end, full-stack web application solutions for the Bureau's growing web presence
Building the app framework that underpins the current generation of Bureau web applications
Development of RESTful APIs to support web and mobile applications
Redefining and redeveloping the service offering of the Defence and Aviation weather services
Mentoring and guidance of the web solutions team
Refining development processes and standards
Development and maintenance of public web site
Providing technical advice and assistance on WCAG accessibility matters

items.title: Bureau's mobile website
items.body: A responsive site designed for mobile phones and tablets that utilises a new data API driven by a custom PHP framework.

items.title: Defence Product Visualiser
items.body: A tool that allows users to create customised card-based dashboards displaying a range of relevant weather products.
Leading the development team in this agency environment
Heavy client/user focused workload
SaaS and web application development in PHP and JavaScript
Web site design and development in XHTML and CSS
Developing custom Smarty templates for in-house CMS
Flash application and animation development
Server administration for Apache and Microsoft IIS platforms
Client liaison throughout life cycle of projects
Client training and ongoing site support

items.title: Shop, Stock and Bill
items.body: An intergrated online store and stock / inventory system. Allows integration with common accounting systems, creating a full end-to-end solution for the client.

items.title: Client Management System
items.body: A client management and marketing tool that allows targeted, customisable SMS and email marketing information to be delivered to hundreds of thousands of clients easily.
